language.title: Language
language.caption: Doom Wallet will support more language in the future.

find.title: Sign
find.beforeScan: If you want to sign a transaction, you need to use MetaMask or BlueWallet to start a transaction and get a QR code. Then you can scan the QR code to sign the transaction.
find.permessionText: Doom Wallet need camera permission to scan a QR code to sign Transaction.
find.cameraPermissionBlocked: Please go to Settings and grant the Camera permission.

tools.title: Tools
tools.offlineWarning: Using this wallet in a offline device will be much safer!
tools.urCaption: UR is Encoding Structured Binary Data for Transport in URIs and QR Codes. You use UR to generate animated QR Code. You can learn more about UR by google BC-UR.
tools.urPlaceholder: Type text to generate animated QR Code. It must be a valid BC-UR string.
tools.urError: Please type a valid BC-UR string.
tools.noCameraPermission: No Camera Permission. You need to grant camera permission to use QR Code Reader.
tools.generatorPlaceHolder: Type text to generate QR Code, max length is 1024
tools.cleanABIDataMessage: Imported ABI data is stored in local storage. You can remove all ABI data by clicking the button below.
tools.importFailed: Import ABI Failed, please check your ABI or QR code
tools.scanABICaption1:
Contract ABI is used to decode the input data of EVM sign request. With ABI, you can learn the function name and parameters while reviewing the sign request.
 You can import ABI by animated QR code. 
 First, you need to get the ABI from the contract. You can get it from etherscan.io or other block explorers. 
 Then, you need to use the link below to generate an animated QR code:
tools.scanABICaption2: Finally, you can click the button below to scan the QR code.

login.remainingTryTimes: You only have {{times}} tries to figure out the password. If you fail, the wallet will be reset.
login.overMaxTryTimes: You have tried too many times. The wallet has been reset. You can try to recover your wallet by mnemonic and password.
login.alertMessage: Are you sure to reset wallet? Please make sure you have backup your mnemonic phrase and password.
login.resetWarning: You can long press this button to ERASE your wallet and setup a new one

airgap.caption:
Please enable Airplane Mode to make sure your device is in a offline status. 
 You can close strict airgap mode in setting.

account.title: Account
account.alertMessage: Are you sure to reset wallet? If you have not backup your mnemonic and password, you will never access your account again!
account.shareTitle: Doom Wallet : a mobile airgap cold wallet
account.shareMessageAndroid: Doom Wallet : a mobile airgap cold wallet. Learn more: https://wave-org.github.io/DoomWallet/#download

export.title: Export Wallet
export.passwordCaption: This password is used to encrypt your exported data. You need this password to import your wallet.

import.title: Import Wallet
import.qrcodeCaption: You can import your wallet by QR Code. The QR Code should be generated by Doom Wallet.
import.notWEF: It's not DOOM WEF QR Code!
import.mnemonicPlaceholder: Type your mnemonic phrase, at least 12 words, splited by space
import.mnemonicWrong: Mnemonic is wrong, please check again
import.wordNotInList: The Mnemonic has some words not in the word list!
import.unlockFailed: Unlock failed, please check your password

setup.title: Create Wallet
setup.differentPlaces: You should backup your mnemonic and password in different places.
setup.neverRecover: If you forget your password, you will never recover your private key.
setup.forgetPassword: If you forget your password, you can recover your wallet by importing your mnemonic again.
setup.rememberSimplePassword: You have to remember your simplePassword.
setup.caption:
In Doom Wallet, a private key is generated by a 24-words mnemonic and a password.
 Password is different from other wallets.
If you forget your password, you will never recover your private key.
You are going to generate a mnemonic. A mnemonic is a sequence of words.
setup.hashCaption: You can also type some random text to generate a mnemonic:
setup.hashPlaceholder: Type random text, at least 16 characters

setPassword.title: Set Password

passwordStrengthByScore.1: Very weak: protection from throttled online attacks. (guesses < 10^6)
passwordStrengthByScore.2: Weak: protection from unthrottled online attacks. (guesses < 10^8)
passwordStrengthByScore.3: Okay: moderate protection from offline slow-hash scenario. (guesses < 10^10)
passwordStrengthByScore.4: Safe: strong protection from offline slow-hash scenario. (guesses >= 10^10)

setPassword.caption: If you forget your password, you can never recover your private key.
setPassword.unlockCaption:
You need a unlock password for imported wallet. It's used to encrypt and decrypt the mnemonic. 
If you forget your unlock password, you can recover your wallet by import the mnemonic again.

securitySetting.title: Security Setting
securitySetting.faceIDPermissionBlocked: Please go to system setting to enable Face ID for Doom Wallet
securitySetting.faceIDCheckFailed: Something wrong with Face ID, please try again
securitySetting.touchIDCheckFailed: Something wrong with your biometric credential, please try again
securitySetting.testBiometricPrompt: Doom wallet is using your biometric credential to secure your wallet
securitySetting.unlockBiometricPrompt: Doom wallet is requiring your biometric credential to unlock your wallet
securitySetting.simplePasswordLengthError: Simple password must be at least 4 characters
securitySetting.noSecurityOptionError: Please select at least one security option
securitySetting.biometricsCaption:
With biometrics, you can use your face or fingerprint to store your secret and unlock your wallet.
 It's much safer. The data will be encrypted by your biometrics. Without your biometrics, no one can access your secret.
securitySetting.withoutBiometrics:
Sorry, your device don't support biometrics. It's better to use another device which support biometrics.
 If your device is supporting biometrics, but you can't find a button to enable biometrics here. You need to restart Doom Wallet after enrolling your biometrics in your device or granting Face ID permission in settings.
securitySetting.simplePasswordCaption: Simple password is a password which is easy to remember. If you trust this device, you can use simple password to login.
securitySetting.twoOptionsNow: We have 2 options for Simple password now:

signEVM.title: Sign EVM Transaction
signEVM.noFoundAddressToast: Addresses can not be derived : The input addresses are not in the wallet
signEVM.invalidQRText: Invalid UR, Can't sign. Please check the QR code
signEVM.noAddressCaption: Please check if this address is correct. It is generated by Doom Wallet. If it's not the same address as your MetaMask address, you can't sign this transaction.

EVM.title: EVM Wallet
EVM.captionAboutDerivationPath: * means account index: for your first account, the account index will be 0. So, the derivation path of the first account will be
EVM.derivationCaption: Derivation Path is used to derive your address. You can learn about it by google BIP32.
EVM.customPathWarning: Make sure you know what you are doing. You can learn more about Derivation Path by google BIP32.
EVM.inputCaption: You can add your path between m/ and /* in the below input:
EVM.inputPlaceholder: Type your path between m/ and /*

BTC.title: Bitcoin Wallet
BTC.captionAboutDerivationPath: Doom Wallet use BIP84 to derive your address. You can learn about it by google BIP84. The derivation path means m / purpose' / coin_type' / account' / change / address_index

signBTC.title: Sign BTC Transaction
signBTC.noFoundAddressToast: Addresses can not be derived : The input addresses are not in the wallet
signBTC.noFoundAddressText: Invalid UR, the input addresses are not in this wallet!
signBTC.invalidQRText: Invalid UR, Can't sign. Please check the QR code

connection.evmText:
Use your MetaMask Wallet to scan this QRCode to connect.
(Add account or hardware wallet -- Connect a hardware wallet-- QR-Based )
connection.btcText:
Use your hot wallet to scan this QRCode to connect.
 We recommend Blue Wallet!
connection.title: Connection QR Code

autoLock.caption:
Choose the amount of time before the application locks automatically.
Doom wallet will lock after the specified amount of time has passed when the app is in the background.
autoLock.title: Auto Lock Setting

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.caption: Choose the appearance of the app.
